msbt.message: Are you close with ?I've actually, you know, never talked to thembut I feel like maybe we'd be legit solid friends. Can you let them know that I'm down to friend it up whenev? They can just come say hey, !
Ohmigosh! Did. You. Hear. About. ?! Everyone's. Talking. About it.Some of us. Can't even. Speak. In. Complete. Sentences. We're just. That excited!
Ohmigosh! Do you know what was doing the other day?!

Is it just me, or has not been around lately?I hope it's not me. I know I can be a little much if I'm full of sugar and big ideas Nah, it's not me.Anyhoo, if you see them, let them know I'm going to pretend to forget their face if I don't see it soon!
I saw today. Looked like they were having the kind of fun you write songs about!
Did you see running around yesterday? I totes did!I don't know what they were up to, but they were ALL the way up to it!
What's up to these days, anyway?I miss their face. If this keeps up, I'm going to forget all the stuff I want to chat with them about!
So. Cool. popped in from !
zipped on over from . It was so great to see them!
Lately I've been missing really bad.I hope they're having fun on But I wish they were here instead, .
You had a pretty good time, huh? It's SO great that could come hang!I hope they get a chance to pop in again really soon, .
Did I hear your friend's name is ? And they're from ?Wow. I know it's a mondo pain to get here, but it'd be fab if they visited again!
It was le totes the best having visit!What a top-notch bestie, coming all the way from to hang out here, !
Your friend who came by the other daydo you think they'll visit again? They're from , aren't they?Wow! That's pretty far, but it'd be fab if they popped on by again someday, !
I heard they were playing forever! They must, like, totes LOVE this island. I totally love too! I'm like, SO glad I moved here!
Is it true that they fished a bunch? What do they do with so many fish? Do they have a spare bedroom?
Is it true they were catching a lot of bugs? Do you think they'd give me some pointers?

They were at the beach picking up a bunch of shells, right?Shells are adorbs. Your friend is adorbs. You're adorbs. I'm adorbs. is adorbsDid you know if you say adorbs too much, it just starts to sound like it's not really a word, ?
Were they digging up clams out on the beach? Were the clams for fish bait?'Cause those things start to smell pretty quick if you just leave them around the house.
They shot down some of those balloon things that float by sometimes!I always miss those. I get all hung up wondering where they came from and I forget to take my shot.
I heard they were wishing on a bunch of shooting stars! Well, I hope all their wishes come true!
I heard they were shaking trees. Why? Were they making up a dance? Maybea pop-star-worthy dance?
I heard they were smacking trees and collecting wood. Was it so they could do some fab DIY?
I want to know why they cut down all those trees! There so must've been a good reason for that. Butwhat?
They totally planted a bunch of stuff! Yeah, I thought it felt a little greener around here. The island looks great!
'K, they watered a bunch of flowers! I feel them. There's no one who likes a dry flower, !
It's amazing how expressive they were! They legit made me look calm.
I heard they were island hopping! Were they trying the different fruits? Ohmigosh! Fruit tour, !
I saw they invited a bunch of friends over from other islands! The airport was buuuuusy!
I heard they were at the DIY workbench most of the time. What were they making, ?!
I don't know what they were working on, but I heard they broke a lot of tools doing it. Likea LOT.
They spent all their time indoors What they were up to? Ooh, were they playing video games?
They spent a lot of time outdoors! That's a totes fab way to do a day on !
I saw them walking around with a shovel Were they burying pitfall seeds?! Don't worry. I won't tell.
Ohmigosh, I feel so bad! I heard they fell into, like, a bunch of pitfall traps!<10_4 /> That'sumcrazy unluckyheh
They were redesigning their place, I guess? I wonder how it all turned out, ?
I saw them staring at their phone really seriously. Were they working out some glam custom designs?!
We actually chatted a LOT! It was so great. We need to do it more often!
I heard they chatted a bunch with . I wonder what the two of them talked about?
I heard they were chatting with a bunch of folks. I have to get in on that. I L-O-V-E love a good chatfest!
I heard they got stung a bunch Well, wasps are jerks. There. I said it. Someone had to.
I heard they were stung by a wasp and their face swelled up super big!I wanted to say, "Wasp the matter?" Get it? "WASP the matter?"No. You're right. That's in way poor taste, and I'm mostly sorry.
I heard they dug up a fossil! So cool. If I found a fossil, I'd name it the Fabasaurus, .
I heard them cracking open, like, ALL the rocks! KRA-POW! KRA-POW! I love that! It's so much fun!But if I overdo it, my hands go all twingle-twangles!
Get. This. I heard they ran around burying Bells! I need to get looking. Maybe the Bells are sprouting
I heard they were picking up a whole bunch of . Solid call! are supes tasty!
I heard they were checking their phone a lot! I do that all the time too! Have to be careful, thoughOne time I was so distracted by looking at my phone, I walked into a tree.
I heard they were on their phone the whole time. I wonder why?<10_4 /> What am I saying? I do the same thing!
I heard they built paths. I need a path construction permit. I'd build a fashion runway around the island!
They have a waterscaping permit! I thought it looked like somebody'd fixed up the riverbed!
I heard they were building cliffs! I need to go check it out later!
I heard they were messing around with fences a lot. Were they building walls to defend against the werefish?I hope?
I heard they were doing some exterior decorating and were rearranging the furniture outside.I need to go and check out 's hot new look!
I heard they got a bunch of Nook Miles. No wonder they looked so happy! Fake money is fab.
Someone saw them come out of Resident Services, jump up, and cheer, "WOOOOO!" I bet they've paid off their loan! That's a big deal. You should tell them congrats, !
I heard they hit up Nook's Cranny a bunch. I hope they found what they were looking for, !
Did they change the island tune? We've always been très boppin', but these beats are très bumpin'!
Did you see the new flag at Resident Services? Is it true they designed it?They're a fab vexillographer, huh?<10_4 /> That's a flag designer, B-T-dubs!
I heard they had a transformation wand! Sparkles and instant fashion! I love those wands so much!
I heard they were using the vaulting pole to jump over all the rivers. I like to scream when I do that.
I heard they were buying a bunch of turnips from Daisy Mae. It so must be nice to be good with turnips.I mean, I'm good at letting turnips rotbut that's not a skill that's going to make me any Bells.
I heard they sold their turnips for a crazy high price! I'm. So. Jelly. My turnips always rot before I sell them!
I heard they were saying a bunch of stuff! It always feels good to say what's on your mind, !
I heard they pulled a ton of weeds. It is a lot cleaner around here! I should send a thank-you note!
I heard they got a new hairdo! The last 'do was cute too, but this new one's total couture!
I heard they got a new look, but I didn't get the deets! If I was them, what would I change?I don't know! It's tough to mess with perfection, !
I heard they snapped a bunch of pictures with their camera.Whichseems like an obvious thing to do with a camera, now that I've said it.

I heard they collected soooo many sea creatures! Like, their diving skills are hardcore! Oooh! Wouldn't it be cool if they found sunken treasure while they were down there?Ha! Maybe I better get some awesome diving skills of my own, !
